text: Hey guys, it’s Ro!

I realized that I have not made an update
video in a
long time and there has been a lot going on.
So, I wanted to make a video today
to keep you guys in the loop.

I’ve been doing a lot of traveling, I traveled
to

Washington, D.C. to attend the White House
Correspondents Dinner.

This was a first for me, I had never done
this before and I met so many
wonderful people.

I was a guest of Ariana Huffington, and for
the record I think
we had the coolest table at the dinner!
I got sit with a lot of other social
media peeps that I had never met before.
I met Steve Aoki, DJ Khaled,

Bill Nye, Cameron Dallas, Zach King, Eden
Alexander, and Fat Joe, it was amazing!

Then, I flew to New York and I was on the
show The Chew, it’s a morning show
all about food, so you know I love it.
And I taught you guys how to make
Marshmallow fondant, really easy recipe.

Also, I traveled to France for the very first
time and loved it!

The food was amazing, the weather was amazing,
I had the opportunity to stay

in Julia Child’s former French cottage,
it’s where she lived where she made the

cookbook Mastering the Art of French Cooking,
Volume Two.

For those of you who don’t know she is one
of my food idols, and to honor her

memory I thought, let’s make 2 of the recipes
from her cookbook, in her kitchen!
And we did!

I’ll put a link down below if you guys missed
that video, I was so happy!
I was like on cloud 9!

I’ve been doing a lot of collabs lately,
I can’t even remember all of them.

I’m gonna put a link down below to any of
them if you missed them, if you want
to check ‘em out.
So just to name a few…

I played the Macaron Challenge and Battleship
with Captain Sparklez,
I made Unicorn Cookies with Lilly,

played the Popsicle Challenge with Ingrid
Nilson, and was on her episode of
Sense of Self.

Was on College Humor’s Bad Internet as Chef
Sarah, made Prickle

Pants Cream Puffs with the Warp Zone, was
on an episode of Shane’s Podcast,

reacted to a cringe compilation, voiced the
character of Miss Blissful in
the animated series Emo Dad, Season 2.

Visited my friends at Home and Family for
a Christmas in July special,
and, made some back to school Pancake Muffins.
We also played a game of Super Heroes
heads up, and, I crushed it like the Hulk!

Played the giant candy challenge with my friend
Jake, made Undertale Spider

Donuts with Dan and Phil, played the Not My
Arms Makeup Challenge with Manny.

Played the Cheesecake Challenge with my friend
Donal and was on his episode
of Dirty Little Food Secrets.
Played the Gargle Challenge and Whisper Challenge

with Madilyn Bailey, also played some heads
up with my friend Lindsey, before
she left me to go on tour again!

Another update is I teamed up and collaborated
with Best Fiends to make this

video and another fun video on their channel,
you can watch it,
it comes out today.

The video is called ‘Don’t Download Best
Fiends!’

It’s like a really funny PSA, warning people
not to download Best Fiends,
because it’s super addictive.

And, I don’t know what you’re talking
about
because I’m only on level 500…

Some of you guys may remember that I posted
a picture a little while back on

Twitter and Facebook of me and Joey and the
actress Kate Walsh together,

and we were filming a secret project, this
is that project.

So, if you watch that video you’ll be able
to see all 3 of us, we’re basically

in an institution where we are addicted to
playing Best Fiends and we’re

being treated and Joey, he’s so funny, he’s
wearing this galaxy, oh, and I’m
wearing galaxy today!

He’s wearing this galaxy straight jacket,
and I’m
in a room where I’m an obsessed baker.
I can kind of relate, because if I went

a little crazy I think that’s what my room
would look like.
Just have baking stuff everywhere!

And I made this like, 3 foot tall, slug cupcake
cake.

It is humongous, it was so much fun, I hugged it, I got
so messy making this, I had
frosting everywhere.

The big slug cake that I made is gonna be
1 of the symbols

in the treasure hunt that starts today, it’s
gonna last 3 weeks, there’s 15
symbols, and our slug cake is 1 of ‘em!

So if you guys want to play the treasure hunt,
I think you get a free character
if you get them all.

Please take a picture of our slug cake and
send it to me,
that would make me so happy!

On Best Fiends’ Facebook page they have
a whole

bunch of hints of where to find the symbols,
but the hint that I can tell you

guys is, look at Kate Walsh’s Shoes in the
Don’t Download Best Fiends Video!

Also, I filmed some behind the scenes footage
while I was on set and I wanted
to share that with you guys!

We did some photo shoots and I love the set
that

they came up with, I got to be a crazy baker
for the day, or as I said,
I’m passionate, I’m not obsessed!

And, something that I did recently that meant
a lot to me is that though the

Make-A-Wish foundation I got to meet 2 amazing
girls, Erica and Ava, we got

to bake and and play games, make good memories
and have some fun, laugh a lot!

With Erica, she loves Minecraft, so we made
Minecraft themed cookies, and
decorated them with her family.
Her sisters were there, it was so much fun,
I was laughing non-stop.

This is for you, I’m sending one of these
to Erica!

If you see this video, I’m sending this
to you!

And, with Ava, we had a blast hanging out,
she wanted to play the Goldfish

Challenge game, and I had only played once
before with my friend Cassey,
and Ava did so good, she kicked my butt.
Ava!
Ava-Ava-Ava-Ava!

Erica, Ava, if you guys are watching this,
just know that I had so much fun hanging

out with you guys, and you are both such an
inspiration.
Let’s talk about events.

I was invited this year to attend the Angry
Birds red carpet premiere.

It was so much fun, they had a lot of baby
animals, they had baby pigs and
birds, live birds that I got to meet.
And they even had a big slingshot, like in

the movie and on the game, where you can
shoot little stuffed animal birds at
this big target.
It was really fun!

I also attended the red carpet premiere of
Warcraft, and loved it!
Coolest!

Attended VidCon, I was on a panel called Girl
Love, I was on a panel with my

besties, Lilly Singh, Lindsey Stirling, Blogalates,
Justine wasn’t there,
but she was there in spirit.
We talked about supporting each other on and
offline, and how we all became friends.
I’ll also put a link down below if you’re
interested in watching that panel.
And I got to meet so many of you guys
at the meet and greet.
Thanks for coming out, I had a blast.

Alright, that does it for the update video,
those are all of the updates
that I can share.

I do have something going on, I filmed a super
secret

project, but I can’t tell you guys yet,
I think it comes out in a few months,

but as soon as I can, I will let you know
ASAP!
But until then, that’s about it.
I hope you guys enjoyed the video, buh-bye!
